My experience untill now

Worked with the finance project to analyze the data using SQL, OLAP cube, excel, power bi and machine learning algorithms like regression analysis and communicated the data to the clients.

1

Understand the requirement

First is to understand the requirement with the client. If questions, ask them upfront.

2

Research your data

After clear understanding of the requirement. Then research your data with some SQL queries/OLAP queries/Excel/ML algorithms to get the better idea about the data.

3

Code and test for the Analysis

After doing some research, code to solve the problem and test your hypothesis to confirm your analysis.

4

Communicate your findings

After confirmation, communicate the insight using various visualization tools like excel, power bi, seaborn and matplotlib libraries.
